vars.processors:
- decode_json_fields:
    fields: ["message"]
    target: ""
    add_error_key: true
- drop_fields:
    when:
      equals:
        logtype: "1001"
    fields: ["src_host", "src_port", "dst_host", "dst_port" ]
    ignore_missing: true
- rename:
    fields:
      - from: "src_host"
        to: "source.ip"
      - from: "src_port"
        to: "source.port"
      - from: "dst_host"
        to: "destination.host"
      - from: "dst_port"
        to: "destination.port"
    ignore_missing: true
- convert:
    fields:
      - {from: "logtype", to: "event.code", type: "string"}
    ignore_missing: true
- drop_fields:
    fields: '["prospector", "input", "offset", "beat"]'
- add_fields:
    target: event
    fields:
      category: host
      module: opencanary
